main event: Three observers reported seeing a single green object with an orange trail that was much brighter than a jet exhaust in Colorado Springs and Denver, Colorado.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3-5 seconds.
The object was moving in a northwest direction.
The sighting was reported by both military and civilian sources.
The object was definitively identified as a meteor by a USAF Captain who was a pilot.
There were no photographs taken of the sighting.
sighted object: a single green object with an orange trail
